channel.title: Need help with moparscape
channel.description:
So. I have a few questions about MoparScape:
1. When i try to enter the game, there comes a message showing: no responce from server. try usin another one or something like that. How can i fix this problem?
2. How can i make my server to play with my friends?
3. How can i make my monsters more hp? and how can i make them drop good items... not just bones??

item.title: Need help with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Prince_Conr Prince Conr
item.description:
@Prince_Conr wrote:

Hmm, I can’t get the link to work, but go to moparisthebest.com, click Forums at the top, then go to the Server Development Forum or whatever and look for a post at the top called Making a Private Server

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @footee footee
item.description:
@footee wrote:

Prince Conr:

There are tutorials for all of this Just take a look at the forum for tutorials and I’m sure you’ll get all the help you need.

Is it possible for a link?

Read full topic
